title: Part Alternation Mark

nouns: In mathematics, the graph of a function f is the collection of all ordered pairs.
A visual representation of the relations between certain quantities plotted with reference to a set of axes
In mathematics, a visual representation of the relations between certain quantities plotted according to a set of axes.

description:
Used in traditional Japanese music such as Noh or Renga, to indicate the start of a song. More specifically, the part alternation mark is displayed where the singer’s part begins.

This symbol looks sort of like a lopsided capital M; or a rollercoaster track showing a dip, and then a drop off to the right.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the part alternation mark emoji presents as a sophisticated, dark gray symbol with a subtle metallic sheen, clearly rendered with Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading. Its clean, geometric lines and smooth, rounded edges convey a sense of precision and logical structure, as seen in Apple's commitment to refined design. This emoji, distinctively appearing on Apple devices, is often used in technical contexts or to indicate a choice between two options.
